affirmation: I am the architect of my fate. I can achieve what I have dreamt for myself
I am living my life in a state of complete abundance
I am attracting positive energy into my life.
I am empowered to make decisions that are in my best interest
I am creating a life filled with joy and abundance.
I am free to make all decisions that matter to me
I am releasing all negativity from my mind and body.
I am whole and complete, embracing all parts of myself with love and acceptance, knowing that I am exactly where I need to be
I am deserving of success and happiness.
I lovingly let go of all energy that no longer serves me
My inner peace and calm keep me centered and focused, even in the midst of chaos
I honor my own boundaries and standards
I am grateful for opening my eyes today, for seeing a new day and for having a chance to experience it. Whatever I do or don’t do today, I will be grateful and kind to myself and my body
I am grateful for the people and systems around me that I can turn to for help. I know I can ask for help when I need it and I know it is brave and healthy to do so
I am grateful for noticing the good things around me – the sights, the sounds, the smells, the feelings. I will take the time to notice them more often and be joyful when I do
I am grateful for the small steps forward that have gotten me to this point of growth in my life
I am happy for having the choice and the chance to grow, to develop, to make amends, and to accept
I am going to choose happiness today.

I am focused and committed to my own growth and journey. I will be proud of the journey of others, root for them and be inspired by them. And I will remind myself that I am walking my own path, creating my own footsteps
I am a success even if I did not reach my goal. I am strong and brave for trying and the best lessons are learned from falling short
I am beautiful, attractive and worthy of being loved. I love my body, I love my mind, I love my smile and the joy it brings to this world
I am valid in who I am in this moment, in this life, in this body. I am valid
I am deserving of good things, healthy love, authentic relationships, and new beginnings
I own my life and I am free to make my own choices
I will let my ambitions motivate me instead of allowing them to scare me
When I take care of myself, positive energy flows more freely to me
I am open to new opportunities and experiences.
I am becoming the best version of myself
I am grateful for all that I have and will accomplish
I am prepared to take advantage of the great opportunities presented to me
I am never giving up on my goals and dreams
I am dependable and resourceful
I am replacing my anger with understanding and compassion
I am believing in my ability to unlock the way and set myself free
I am allowing myself to experience peace in this situation regardless of how things are
I’m freeing myself from all destructive doubt and fear
I accept myself and create peace in my mind and heart
It’s going to be okay
With every breath, I inhale positivity and exhale my negativity
I will breathe, I will be patient and I will figure things out
I am on an endless journey through eternity and there is plenty of time. All is well
I choose to find the positive in difficult situations
I treat myself with the same kindness and compassion as anyone else I love
My breath carries me through even the most challenging times
I am showing up as the best version of myself today
I am in control of my thoughts and my behavior and I will use them to lift myself up
I am worthy of all the love, happiness, peace, and success that I desire even though I am not perfect
I am worthy and prepared for all the abundance I wish to receive
I have all the tools within me to succeed
I am fierce, loved, and capable
I accept and forgive myself completely
I am slowly but surely moving towards the life I desire
My body deserves respect for all that it’s capable of doing
My body is worthy of love and respect as it is
I release worries that drain my energy, trusting that everything is working out in my favor
I am a magnet for positivity and joy, releasing all negativity with ease
It is safe to be here, and it is safe to be me
I am capable of setting healthy boundaries with others
I lovingly let go of all energy that no longer serves me.
